title: Frontend integration: socket flow and event rendering
body:
Deliverables:
- Verify `events:initial` is consumed and displayed.
- Ensure incremental `events:new` updates render within 1-3s.
- Add fallback UI for empty state and connection loss.
- Add integration test for socket â†’ renderer flow.

References: docs/prd/PRD-world-pulse.md, src/renderer, src/shared/types.ts
